type.description: The type of the event, always `response.output_item.done`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was completed.

anyOf.description: An item representing a message, tool call, tool output, reasoning, or other response element.

title: Response output item done event
description: A streaming event that indicated an output item was completed.
